scripts.pinecone:index: node scripts/pinecone-index.js 'Hello world|This is another chunk'
scripts.pinecone:openai:upsert: node scripts/pinecone-openai-upsert.js --index my-openai-index --texts 'Hello from OpenAI|Another sample' --cloud aws --region us-east-1 --metric cosine --model text-embedding-3-small
